document_data.name: Faerûnian languages
document_data.mainbody: The '''Faerûnian languages''' were a family of languages spoken by the majority of [[human]]s on the continent of [[Faerûn]]. The '''Faerûnian language family''' encompassed roughly 50 distinct human languages, including [[Common]].
document_data.Language Groups:
The following language groups were considered by scholars to belong to the Faerûnian language family:
* [[Illuski languages|Illuski]]
* [[Waelan]]
* [[Ulou languages|Ulou]]
* [[Thorass languages|Thorass]]
* [[Chessan languages|Chessan]]
* [[Raumtheran languages|Raumtheran]]
document_data.Script: The vast majority of languages in this family used the [[Thorass alphabet]].
